name: Road De Versailles!
description:
Road De Versailles!

A cute match 3 game depicting your journey to Versailles.
Collect the right tiles to follow the map, collect the wrong ones and you'll get lost. Your car battery is broken though, so make sure your speed never hits 0 otherwise it's game over.

Match 4 or 5 tiles for a flourish effect!

Made in two weeks for a game jam, by the lovely folks at team 5 "Packed Bags Studio"
